meanings.definition: To make great efforts to achieve or obtain something.
meanings.sent1: She strove to finish her homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: He strove to become a better basketball player by practicing every day.
meanings.sent3: The little ant strove to carry the heavy crumb back to its nest.
meanings.sent4: The determined student strove against all odds to pass the exam.
meanings.sent5: The young athlete strove for victory in the championship game.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she strove to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent2: He strove to improve his grades throughout the semester.
meanings.sent3: The tired runner strove to reach the finish line despite his exhaustion.
meanings.sent4: The team of scientists strove together to make a groundbreaking discovery.
meanings.sent5: The artist strove for perfection in every brushstroke of her painting.
